privacy.title: Privacy & Safety
privacy.description: Manage your privacy settings and keep your account secure.
privacy.dmDesc: Control who can send you direct messages

age.title: Age Verification
age.description: Review your current verification status or rerun verification.

ageVerification.title: Age Verification Required
ageVerification.onDeviceDesc: Everything runs locally in your browser. Nothing is uploaded.
ageVerification.openSourceDesc: Every line of code is auditable. No black boxes.
ageVerification.zeroThirdPartyDesc: No external APIs, SDKs, or cloud services involved. Period.
ageVerification.infoLead: Here is what you need to know about this verification process.
ageVerification.howItWorks1: AI models (TensorFlow.js) run directly in your browser
ageVerification.howItWorks2: Camera feed is processed in-memory only
ageVerification.howItWorks3: ID documents are scanned locally with Tesseract.js OCR
ageVerification.howItWorks4: Face on ID is matched to your live face using local embeddings
ageVerification.privacyGuarantees1: Zero images stored on disk or sent over the network
ageVerification.privacyGuarantees2: No face embeddings or biometric templates persisted
ageVerification.privacyGuarantees3: No analytics, session replay, or error logging
ageVerification.privacyGuarantees4: No third-party SDKs, APIs, or cloud services
ageVerification.whatWeStore1: Pass/fail verdict and a hashed proof transcript only
ageVerification.whatWeStore2: OCR text discarded immediately after DOB extraction
ageVerification.whatWeStore3: Face descriptors are in-memory only, garbage collected on close
ageVerification.tipsBestResults1: Good, even lighting on your face
ageVerification.tipsBestResults3: For ID: ensure MRZ zone or DOB is clearly visible
ageVerification.tipsBestResults4: Blink naturally -- liveness checks detect frozen images
ageVerification.methodLead: Select how you would like to verify your age. All methods run entirely on your device.
ageVerification.faceScanDesc: AI estimates your age from a live camera feed across 24 frames with blink liveness detection. Fastest option.
ageVerification.idDocumentDesc: Scan your ID locally. OCR extracts date of birth, MRZ checksums are validated, and face is matched to you.
ageVerification.hybridDesc: Face scan first. If the result is inconclusive, falls back to ID document. Most reliable approach.
ageVerification.uploadIdPrompt: Upload a clear photo of the front of your ID document.
ageVerification.noRetriesLeft: No retries left. Close and reopen later to try again.
ageVerification.ageVerified: Your age has been verified as 18+. You now have access to this channel.
ageVerification.couldNotConfirm: The verification could not confirm you are 18 or older.
ageVerification.complete18Plus: Your 18+ verification is complete and will not expire. You can now access age-restricted channels.
ageVerification.noImagesStored: No images, video, or biometric data were stored or transmitted.
ageVerification.onlyVerdictRecorded: Only a pass/fail verdict and hashed proof were recorded.
ageVerification.tryAgainLater: You can close this dialog and try again later.
ageVerification.noRetriesRemaining: No retries remaining. Close and reopen later to try again.

common.loginRequired: You need to log in to continue.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Choose how VoltChat looks to you. 70+ curated palettes, custom themes, and gradients.
appearance.customThemeDesc: Create your own palette and optionally add a background gradient.

about.title: About VoltChat
about.description: A powerful real-time chat application built with React and Node.js. Featuring voice channels, direct messages, and OAuth 2.0 authentication.

serverSettings.serverThemeDesc: Customize colors and banner to brand your server.
serverSettings.channelsAndCategoriesDesc: Manage your server's channels and categories. Drag to reorder.
serverSettings.noCategoriesYet: No categories yet. Create one above!
serverSettings.serverDiscoveryDesc: Submit your server to the discovery page to let new users find it
serverSettings.serverVisibleInDiscovery: Your server is visible on the Server Discovery page
serverSettings.serverWaitingReview: Your server is waiting for review
serverSettings.emojisDesc: Upload custom emojis for your server. Members can use them in messages with :emoji_name: syntax.
serverSettings.noCustomEmojis: No custom emojis yet. Upload one above!
serverSettings.serverBotsDesc: Manage bots installed in this server. Bots can respond to messages, run commands, and automate tasks.
serverSettings.endToEndEncryptionDesc: Secure your server messages with end-to-end encryption. When enabled, messages can only be read by server members, not even server admins can read them.
serverSettings.messagesEncrypted: Messages in this server are end-to-end encrypted
serverSettings.messagesNotEncrypted: Messages are not encrypted in this server
serverSettings.deviceHasDecryptionKey: Your device has the decryption key
serverSettings.deviceMissingDecryptionKey: You don't have the decryption key - messages cannot be read
serverSettings.encryptionEnableNotice1: All existing messages will remain unencrypted
serverSettings.encryptionEnableNotice3: Members will need to join encryption to read messages
serverSettings.encryptionEnableNotice4: Members can export their keys for device recovery
serverSettings.enableEncryptionConfirm: Enable end-to-end encryption for this server?
serverSettings.currentEncryptionStatus: Current encryption status for this server
serverSettings.rotateEncryptionConfirm: Rotate encryption keys? All members will need to rejoin encryption.
serverSettings.disableEncryptionConfirm: Disable end-to-end encryption? All encrypted messages will become unreadable.
serverSettings.encryptionNotEnabled: Encryption is not enabled on this server.
serverSettings.joinedEncryptionSecure: You have joined the encryption - your messages are secure
serverSettings.joinEncryptionPrompt: Encryption is enabled on this server. Join to enable reading and sending encrypted messages.
serverSettings.dangerWarning: These actions are irreversible. Be careful!
serverSettings.deleteServerWarning: Once you delete a server, there is no going back. Please be certain.
serverSettings.kickMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to kick this member?
serverSettings.banMemberConfirm: Are you sure you want to ban this member?
serverSettings.transferOwnershipConfirm: Transfer server ownership to {{username}}? You will no longer be the owner.
serverSettings.deleteChannelConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this channel?
serverSettings.deleteRoleConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this role?

migration.title: Database Migration
migration.desc: Migrate your data between different database backends.
migration.toolDesc: Migrate your data between different database types. A backup will be created automatically.
migration.selectTargetDesc: All database types are available — the database can be running locally or on a remote server. Select a target and enter connection details below.
migration.driverNotInstalledDesc: The required npm package for {{name}} is not installed on this server yet. You can still configure the connection details for a remote database.
migration.connectionDetails: Enter the connection details below. The database can be on this server or a remote host.
migration.completeDesc: The configuration has been updated. Please restart the server to complete the migration.
migration.confirmMigrate: Migrate from {{from}} to {{to}}? A backup will be created.
migration.prepared: Migration prepared! Server restart required to complete.

json.name: JSON Files
json.desc: Simple file-based storage, no setup required
